settings.faq_answer_1:
We only have one set of ears and we live in a noisy world, so protecting our hearing is crucial. That is why we created Loop Earplugs, which combine protection and comfort. They help you avoid sensory overload by reducing annoying or loud sounds, are reusable and stylish! Thanks to the different sizes and designs you are sure to find a Loop that totally fits – and suits – you!

These are very different from any other earplugs you’ve tried before. Your ears will get the very best protection, in the most comfortable, durable and stylish way. Whatever the level of noise reduction you’re looking for, we’ve got a Loop for you.

Sounds good? Give us a try! With ear tips in 4 different sizes and lots of fun colours to choose from you’re guaranteed to find your perfect fit.
settings.faq_question_2: What are the benefits of Loop Experience and Loop Experience Pro?
settings.faq_answer_2: Loop Experience earplugs are designed so sound and speech remains clear yet less loud, by mimicking your ears’ acoustical function. Say what? Yes, its unique technology, combining an acoustic channel with mesh, reduces ambient sounds by 18 dB. Enough to protect your ears without compromising on the experience.
settings.faq_question_3: What are the benefits of Loop Quiet?
settings.faq_answer_3: Peace and quiet in the most comfortable circumstances: that’s what you get with Loop Quiet. These earplugs, made of soft silicone, are designed to lower ambient noise by 27 dB. Enough to let you concentrate, sleep or travel peacefully
settings.faq_question_4: What are the benefits of Loop Mute?
settings.faq_answer_4: Loop Mute is an add-on to give you even more noise reduction, whenever you want. Inserted into Loop Experience or Experience Pro plugs, it further lowers the sound by 5 dB. Or just add it to your Quiet earplugs and customize them with a colour combo.
settings.faq_question_5: What are the benefits of Loop Carry cord?
settings.faq_answer_5: The Carry Cord keeps your Loops handy for when you need volume control, pronto. Whether you’ve got your Carry Case or not, the Carry Cord will keep your Loops safely around your neck for easy access.
settings.faq_question_6: Can I still have a conversation wearing Loop Earplugs?
settings.faq_answer_6: No need for sign language. Our Experience products are designed to keep speech and music crystal clear, while still offering you the best hearing protection there is.
settings.faq_question_7: What level of sound reduction does Loop offer?
settings.faq_answer_7: The Loop Experience and Loop Experience Pro models provide an 18 dB sound reduction across all frequencies and up to 23 dB with the Mute add-on inserted. Our Quiet product reduces sound by 27 dB.
settings.faq_question_8: I can hear myself talk when I wear earplugs. Is this normal?
settings.faq_answer_8: Trust us, you’re 100% normal. This phenomenon, which is called ‘occlusion’, has been reported by all earplug users. It is in fact a sign that you are wearing your plugs correctly. When you can hear yourself talk, it’s an indication the seal between your ear and ear canal is secure. Everybody experiences this, and the good news is you get used to it very quickly.
settings.faq_question_9: What is the difference between Loop and regular earplugs?
settings.faq_answer_9:
They are very comfortable (ear tips in 4 sizes to find your perfect fit), reusable and they look awesome!

Our Experience products are much more technical and perform very differently from the standard earplugs you're used to. While regular earplugs just block sound, both Experience models are designed to mimic your ear's function so the sound remains natural but at reduced volume levels.

If you just want to push noise to the background and enjoy maximal comfort, Loop Quiet is for you. People typically use Quiet for sleep, focus and travel.

Need smaller ear tips? We've got you covered with XXS ear tips that are available separately! (Only compatible with Loop Experience)
settings.faq_question_10: What is the difference between Loop Experience and Loop Experience Pro?
settings.faq_answer_10: The Experience Pro includes new accessories so you can fine-tune the fit and sound filtering. Inside the box, you will find an additional set of foam ear tips along with the Loop Mute. Loop Mute is an add-on to give you even more noise reduction, whenever you want.
settings.faq_question_11: How do your products compare with the Flare Calmer ones?
settings.faq_answer_11: Loop Experience is CE (Europe) and ANSI (USA) certified hearing protection, which reduces the noise by 18 dB across low, mid and high frequencies. For noise-sensitive people, it reduces stress and sensory overload by reducing the noise level. Judging from the Flare Calmer product description, this product does not offer a noise reducing component and is not certified as hearing protection. Loop comes with soft silicone ear tips in 4 sizes for your perfect fit, and we believe it looks way better ;)
settings.faq_question_12: Where and when can I use them?
settings.faq_answer_12:
Life getting too loud? Loop is the answer. Whenever you want to lower the volume for protection and/or comfort.

Our Experience earplugs are loved by musicians, concert-goers, motorcyclist, teachers … even parents. Ideal for those moments when you want to reduce sounds to a more comfortable level, while still hearing perfectly.

settings.faq_question_1: Why have Loop and Tomorrowland joined forces?
settings.faq_answer_1: It was written in the stars. Just like Loop, Tomorrowland has a progressive, customer-first mindset coupled with a passion for music. For these bona fide Belgian brands, it’s a match made in heaven!
settings.faq_question_2: Why is hearing protection at festivals important?
settings.faq_answer_2:
At festivals and other live events, you’re constantly exposed to sound levels that can permanently damage your hearing. Even 15 minutes of intake at 100 dB can negatively impact your health. Ever come home from a concert or festival with that ringing, pounding sound and sensation in your ears? That’s a tell-tale sign of hearing damage. Though the ringing may fade within a few hours or days, the damage can last a lifetime. 

Hearing protection helps stop this process in its tracks. And can help you avoid serious conditions down the line – like tinnitus.
settings.faq_question_3: Why are Loop’s Experience products ideal for festivals?
settings.faq_answer_3: The simple answer: they enhance your experience while protecting you from hearing damage. They do this by reducing decibel intake while preserving crystal-clear sound quality. This is thanks to their innovative design around an acoustic channel. You don't need to worry that you won’t be able to chat with friends between sets. You can also personalize your Loops. Add colorful Ear tips and Loop Mute for added decibel coverage. Everything we design aims to not only protect your hearing, but to elevate your experience. And your look, too. And Loops never get uncomfortable. So you can wear them all day long – or store them in their special carry case when needed. All our products are tested and certified in Germany.
settings.faq_question_4: What are the benefits of using Loop Quiet Earplugs at festivals?
settings.faq_answer_4: During the day, festivals are about living life to the fullest and maximizing music consumption. But it’s important to get a good night’s sleep between sunset and sunrise on the next fun-filled day. Loop Quiet Earplugs help eliminate distracting sounds so you can rest easy – without completely muting the stuff you still want to hear. The Loop Quiet is made of soft-touch silicone and comes with ear tips available in sizes XS to L. This helps make sure your earplugs suit your ears without falling out, sticking out or causing discomfort. They’re also super bendy and flexible. And they’re easily washable in running water or with a damp cloth. This means you can reuse them indefinitely – so the earth will thank you, too.
settings.faq_question_5: How do Loop Experience Earplugs keep sound so clear?
settings.faq_answer_5: It’s all in the technology. Loop Experience Earplugs are built around an acoustic channel, combined with a filter and membrane. The acoustic channel mirrors the length of a human ear canal. This translates into 18 decibels of noise reduction, all while sounds and speech remain clear.
settings.faq_answer_6:
All Loop products have a declaration of conformity and are in compliance with the laws covering PPE (personal protective equipment). We test extensively and all our products are officially certified as hearing protection.

The certifications that our products comply with are the following:

EU Certification Standard: EN 352-2:2020

US Certification Standard: ANSI S3.19-1974 (ASA STD 1-1975)

Loop Quiet

US Declaration of Conformity

EU Declaration of Conformity

Loop Experience

US Declaration of Conformity

settings.faq_question_7: How can Loop customers benefit from the collaboration?
settings.faq_answer_7: For a limited time, you can order a pair of exclusive Tomorrowland x Loop Experience Earplugs. Enjoy a once-in-a-lifetime festival experience with the best sound quality around. Followed by a lifetime without hearing damage.
settings.faq_question_8: I bought my Loop Earplugs at the festival – how can I return them?
settings.faq_answer_8: If you purchased your Loops at the festival site and they’ve become damaged, you can request a replacement pair by contacting our Customer Happiness Team. Refunds are not possible.
settings.faq_question_9: Until when will the Loop x Tomorrowland Experience Earplugs be available?
settings.faq_answer_9: Our limited-edition Loop x Tomorrowland Experience Earplugs will be available for purchase from 27 June 2022 – until they’re sold out. So don’t wait too long, or you’ll miss out on the fun!
settings.faq_question_10: What if the Loop x Tomorrowland Experience Earplugs go out of stock?
settings.faq_answer_10: The Loop x Tomorrowland Experience Earplugs are a limited-edition product that we’ve developed for this collaboration specifically. So, in this case, out of stock means… out of stock! You know what they say about the early bird… But even if you miss the worm, our classic Loop Experience Earplugs are here to stay! Customize and order here to experience the difference.

settings.faq_question_1: Why is hearing protection at festivals important?
settings.faq_answer_1:
At festivals and other live events, you’re constantly exposed to sound levels that can permanently damage your hearing. Even 15 minutes of intake at 100 dB can negatively impact your health. Ever come home from a concert or festival with that ringing, pounding sound and sensation in your ears? That’s a tell-tale sign of hearing damage. Though the ringing may fade within a few hours or days, the damage can last a lifetime.  

Hearing protection helps stop this process in its tracks. And can help you avoid serious conditions down the line – like tinnitus.
settings.faq_question_2: Why are Loop's Experience products ideal for festivals?
settings.faq_answer_2:
The simple answer: they enhance your experience while protecting you from hearing damage. They do this by reducing decibel intake while preserving crystal-clear sound quality. This is thanks to their innovative design around an acoustic channel. You don't need to worry that you won’t be able to chat with friends between sets.  

You can also personalize your Loops. Add colorful Ear tips and Loop Mute for added decibel coverage. 

Everything we design aims to not only protect your hearing, but to elevate your experience. And your look, too. And Loops never get uncomfortable. So you can wear them all day long – or store them in their special carry case when needed. All our products are tested and certified in Germany.

settings.faq_answer_3: It’s all in the technology. Loop Experience Earplugs are built around anacoustic channel, combined with afilter and membrane. The acoustic channel mirrors the length of a human ear canal. This translates into18 decibels of noise reduction, all while sounds and speech remain clear.
settings.faq_question_4: What are the benefits of using Loop Quiet Earplugs at festivals?
settings.faq_answer_4: During the day, festivals are about living life to the fullest and maximizing music consumption. But it’s important to get a good night’s sleep between sunset and sunrise on the next fun-filled day. Loop Quiet Earplugs help eliminate distracting sounds so you can rest easy – without completely muting the stuff you still want to hear. The Loop Quiet is made of soft-touch silicone and comes with ear tips available in sizes XS to L. This helps make sure your earplugs suit your ears without falling out, sticking out or causing discomfort. They’re also super bendy and flexible. And they’re easily washable in running water or with a damp cloth. This means you can reuse them indefinitely – so the earth will thank you, too.

settings.faq_question_1: What if I want to return my order?
settings.faq_answer_1: We have a 100-day return policy, which means you have 100 days after receiving your item to request a return for any reason. Please contact us to request a return and make sure you include your order number and return reason. Once we have received the returned merchandise, your order will be refunded within 5 business days. Shipping fees are non-refundable.
settings.faq_question_2: What if I want to change or cancel my order?
settings.faq_answer_2: Please get in touch with us immediately via this form. As we like to process orders as soon as they are placed, changing or cancelling may not be possible anymore. If you’ve already received a confirmation email, it means your order has shipped and it will be too late to make any changes. Of course, you can always return your order once it has reached you.
settings.faq_question_3: What should I do if I haven’t received a confirmation email?
settings.faq_answer_3: If your order was processed successfully, you should have received a confirmation email. Not there? Make sure to check your spam folder. Still nothing? Get in touch with us through this form.
settings.faq_question_4: My order arrived with something missing. What happens now?
settings.faq_answer_4: Even though all orders are processed with the utmost care, we are only human and mistakes happen. If your order is incomplete or has any other issues, please contact us with your order number and we will make sure the issue is solved immediately.

settings.faq_answer_1:
We ship worldwide from our central warehouse in Belgium. Standard shipping is handled by Deutsche Post and then transferred to the local postal carrier in the destination country.

Express shipping is also available through DHL, DPD and UPS depending on the destination. 

All the available shipping options and delivery times are listed during checkout.
settings.faq_question_2: How can I track my order?
settings.faq_answer_2:
You will receive a confirmation email with a tracking number within 1 working day of placing your order. Click on your tracking number and you will be redirected to the tracking page.

Did you opt for standard shipping? We advise you to track your order through your local postal service's website once it has arrived in your country.

settings.faq_answer_1: Take the ring of the Loop between your thumb and index finger, put it in your ear. Once sealed in the ear canal, turn and adjust so your Loops aren't visible from the front.
settings.faq_question_2: How do I change the eartips?
settings.faq_answer_2: Take the ear tip between your thumb and index finger, simply push and twist it over Loop's stem until it can't go any further. A tip for the silicone ear tips: flip the flexible part of the ear tip backward before installing it on Loop's stem.

settings.heading: Triggered by noise?
settings.subheading: Manage your anxiety, experience true calm.

settings.text: Designed to take the edge off while enabling you to not miss a peep! They're ultra-comfortable and fit all types of ears.

settings.heading: "I use these any time I'm out in public or, having a very anxious day and it's the first time I've felt "normal" in public, in years!!"
